summary:
A Skyrim Re-vision of Bishop from Neverwinter Nights 2

Neverwinter Nights 2 was published by Blizzard Entertainment in Oct. 31, 2006 and created by Obsidian Entertainment.

!!! ALL RIGHTS TO BISHOP BELONG TO NEVERWINTER NIGHTS 2 MADE BY BLIZZARD ENTERTAINMENT!!!
!!!DO NOT DISTRIBUT
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Bishop is the Chaotic and evil human ranger companion of Neverwinter Nights 2; in the Official Campaign.
[u][b]
Neverwinter Nights 2 was published by Blizzard Entertainment in Oct. 31, 2006 and created by Obsidian Entertainment.[/b][/u][u][b]

[/b][/u][/size][u][b][color=#ffd966][size=3]!!! ALL RIGHTS TO BISHOP BELONG TO NEVERWINTER NIGHTS 2 MADE BY BLIZZARD ENTERTAINMENT!!![/size][/color][/b][/u][u][b][color=#ffd966][size=3]!!!DO NOT DISTRIBUTE!!![/size][/color][/b][/u][size=3] [color=#ffd966]!!!! MUST READ !!!!![/color][color=#ffd966] [/color][color=#ffd966]UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCE SHOULD YOU DISTRIBUTE THIS MOD ON ANY OTHER PLATFORM OR SITE, ALL PERMISSIONS BELONG TO BLIZZARD ENTERTAINMENT AND OBSIDIAN ENTERTAINMENT[/color][color=#ffd966] 
[/color][color=#ffd966]ALL CREDIT FOR THE MAKING THE MOD GOES TO GRIFFINSKMODS[/color][color=#ffd966] [/color][color=#ffd966]CREATION KIT AND GAME CREDIT TO BETHESDA SOFTWARE[/color][color=#ffd966] [/color][color=#ffd966]IF YOU ARE PAYING FOR THIS MOD AND NO CREDIT IS GIVEN TO BLIZZARD FOR BISHOP OR GRIFFINSKMODS FOR THE CREATION OF THE MOD;
[/color][color=#ffd966]PLEASE INFORM US. BISHOP BELONGS TO BLIZZARD AND ALL THEY'RE ASSOCIATIONS AND IN NO WAY SHOULD THIS MOD BE USED TO MAKE MONEY FROM IT IS AGAINST TERMS AND CONDITIONS AND CAN GET WHOEVER DOES INTO A LOT OF TROUBLE.[/color][color=#ffd966] [/color][color=#ffd966]!!!!PLEASE DON'T DO NOT DISTRIBUTE!!!!

[/color][size=3]Bishop from NWN has been Re-envisioned into the world of Skryim giving life to this once messed up and crazy man that all the boys and girls love. He's more then just a basic follower, Bishop has his very own class, combat style, and weapon he quips and I will say this now.

[/size]Where to find Bishop
------------------------------
Bannered Mare Whiterun

[size=3]No you[u] cannot marry him [and there are no plans to make him marriageable][/u] and he's got quite the mouth on him so expect to be offended now and again with some back handed compliments. . .well more like insults he rarely compliments.[/size][size=3] [/size][size=3]If you're the kind of person who expects him to be a [/size][u][b][size=3]White Knight or a Misunderstood Bad Boy Bishop is [/size][color=#ffd966][size=4][i]NOT[/i][/size][/color][/b][/u][size=3] for you; there's only a few things he cares about gold, women, and getting what he wants even if it means throwing the Dragonborn him/herself under the bus to get it.[/size][size=3] [/size][size=3]Bishop comes with his own Personal Customized Bow and House, the more you get to know him the more you get to love or hate him. He's a bad to the bone boy and he's looking to rip Skyrim and Tamriel a new one.

Thank you for downloading the Bishop Mod and if there are any problems with the mod like crashes or glitches please let us know thought message or leave a forum post and we'll see what we can do to fix it. [/size]Enjoy!!

P.S. 
If there is a problem with loading the mod or you are getting a floating bald head follow these step or use the READ ME in the .zip.[/size]

[size=3]HOW TO INSTALL MANUALLY
1. Download the mod manually and open .zip file.

 2. Go to Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim and find the Data Folder
[preferably open two windows of the Skyrim Properties to do Mesh and Textures at once or just repeat with Mesh file.]

 3. Go to Data -> Textures -> actors -> character Now drop the Bishop Texture file in; then return to the Data folder.

 4. Repeat step with Mesh Data -> Meshes -> Actors -> Character Drop in the Bishop Mesh file

A big ol' THANKS to these wonderful modders [and files that you should have to have the desired outcome unless you don't want him clothes not sure that that matters or not]
[u][b][color=#ffd966][i]
CREDITS[/i][/color][/b][/u]

author: GriffinSKMods
